content: पार्ष्णिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [पृष्-नि नि° वृद्धिः; <ls>Uṇ. 4. 52</ls>] {@--1@} The heel; उद्वेजयत्यंगुलिपार्ष्णिभागान् <ls>Ku. 1. 11</ls>; पार्ष्णिप्रहार <ls>K. 119.</ls> {@--2@} The rear of an army. {@--3@} The back or rear in general; शुद्धपार्ष्णिरयान्वितः <ls>R. 4. 26</ls> ‘with his rear cleared of foes.’ {@--4@} A kick. {@--5@} Desire of conquering {@--6@} Inquiry. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A licentious woman. {@--2@} An epithet of Kuntī.
